DOC.brief_summary: Aim: To examine a new method to perform local anesthesia in order to diminish the inconvenience by the procedure in patients before performing intubation or oesophagogastroduodenoscopy.
DOC.brief_title: Development of a New Method for Analgesia
DOC.detailed_description: A phase one and two study. part one is performed as a single arm unblinded uncontrolled study in 16 obese patients undergoing awake intubation (investigational pill). The second part is a phase two study randomized single blinded study in 100 patient attending a day case endoscopy unit for oesophagogastroduodenoscopy (investigational pill versus lidocaine suspension).
DOC.criteria: Patients admitted for adipositas surgery Patients who attend for oesophagogastroduodenoscopy. Severe psychiatric diseases Alcohol abuse
